findings.title: Trust Issue Of Admin Keys
findings.description: In the `ZKID` implementation, there is a privileged account that plays a critical role in governing and regulating the token-wide operations (e.g., mint more tokens into circulation and pause the token). Our analysis shows that this privileged account needs to be scrutinized.

findings.title: Simplified Logic in ZKID Constructor
findings.description: The `ZKID` token contract has a constructor that directly initializes the current owner as well as mint the initial `100,000 ZKID` amount into circulation.
